name: Sector 0 Rooftop Floor
description: Isometric floor texture for the rooftop diorama.
visualPrompt: Top-down view of rain-slicked rooftop floor, Neo-Tokyo industrial metal grating, puddles reflecting neon pink and cyan lights, cyberpunk aesthetic, tileable seamless texture, 8k, highly detailed, cel shaded anime style, no characters, no people, flat orthographic lighting.
